snippet: When they meet in Mexico on Monday, Group of 20 leaders are expected to ask European leaders to describe their progress on their bailout funds and on building a closer financial union.
lead_paragraph: When they meet in Mexico on Monday, Group of 20 leaders are expected to ask European leaders to describe their progress on their bailout funds and on building a closer financial union.

headline.main: Group of 20 to Urge Quicker Action in Europe
headline.print_headline: Group of 20 to Urge Quicker Action in Europe
